name: Async Design Sprint
description:
Our team at Bananatag ran our first remote design sprint AND we did it asynchronously through FigJam!


We primarily used this 4-day design sprint to help narrow down areas of work we wanted to focus on. This includes exercises such as goal alignment, mapping, lightning demos, and more (we didnâ€™t include prototyping or user testing).


To start using this template, we recommend the following steps:

  1. Duplicate this template.
  2. Create a slack channel (ex. #design-sprint-[projectname]) and invite your participants.
  3. Write a brief intro on the sprint details. We suggest pinning the FigJam link to the channel for quick access.
  4. Collaborate, update your team on progress, and enjoy!
